entity.name: [EC Test] Trump ends press briefing early after question on COVID-19 testing

text: @thehill The only disgrace right now is you @realDonaldTrump so many People are dying from the #Coronavirus and all you do is continue to spread false information. But yet you try to call out #Obama youre Trash #Trump #DonaldTrump #TrumpMeltdown #theHill #BarackObama #TrumpsJealousOfObama
